description: I wish the July 6 front-page article “A ‘first listener’ toughened by loss ” had pushed harder on the Walkers’ claim that Tonette Walker, wife of GOP presidential candidate Scott Walker, received a threat vowing to “gut her like a deer.” The Walkers have been peddling that story for years, including in Scott Walker’s book and in his speeches leading up to his campaign. But there is no evidence to support it. Read full article >>
title: The full story on the Walkers
